symbols.name: Symbols

label.name: Label

clozeformula.name: Cloze Math Formula
clozeformula.description: Cloze question type with math formula inputs.

handwriting_recognises.name: Handwriting Recognises

is_math.name: Has Mathematical Formulas
is_math.description: Set to true to have LaTeX or MathML contents to be rendered with mathjax.

math_renderer.name: Math renderer
math_renderer.description: Choose the rendering engine for math content within a question. Default rendering engine is MathJax with MathQuill for input areas. If you change this option to "MathQuill", MathQuill will render all math content within a question.

distractor_rationale.name: Distractor Rationale
distractor_rationale.description: Used for storing the distractor rationales that map to responses in the same order for use/rendering by the host environment.

rubric_reference.name: Rubric Reference
rubric_reference.description: A unique identifier for the rubric to be used with the question - defaults to course rubric if assigned in activity

sample_answer.name: Sample Answer
sample_answer.description: A sample answer to be displayed on the Learnosity dashboard. HTML is supported.

acknowledgements.name: Acknowledgements
acknowledgements.description: References for any text passages, documents, images etc. used in the question.

stimulus.name: Stimulus
stimulus.description: HTML/Text content displayed in all states (initial, resume, review) rendered above the response area. Supports embedded Feature <span> tags.

stimulus_review.description: HTML/Text content displayed only in review state rendered above the response area. Supports embedded Feature <span> tags. Will override stimulus in review state.
stimulus_review.name: Stimulus in review

fontsize.description: Controls the size of base font for this question. Options are among 'small', 'normal', 'large', 'xlarge' and 'xxlarge'.

validation_stem_numeration.description: Numeration character to be displayed to the left of the validation label.
validation_stem_numeration.name: Validation Stem Numeration

response_font_scale.description: This scales the font relative to the question's font size.
response_font_scale.name: Response font scale

type.description: Keyboard style. See the knowledgebase article on formula keyboard types for more information.
type.name: Type

min_width.name: Response minimum width
min_width.description: Controls the minimum width of the response input area, e.g. 550px

feedback_attempts.description: If instant_feedback is true, this field determines how many times the user can click on the 'Check Answer' button, with 0 being unlimited.
feedback_attempts.name: Number of feedback attempts allowed

instant_feedback.description: Flag to determine whether to display a 'Check Answer' button to provide instant feedback to the user.
instant_feedback.name: Provide instant feedback

penalty.description: Positive value indicating the marks deducted for an incorrect response.
penalty.name: Penalty score

scoring_type.description:
Defines the scoring approach used.
Exact Match: Entire response must match exactly
Partial Match: A relative part of the score will be given for each correct response area
Partial Match per response: Cumulative Score value will be given for each correct response area
scoring_type.name: Scoring type
